official-title.#text:
To mandate all Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner of the House of Representatives to
			 complete annual ethics training conducted by the Committee on Ethics.

header.#text: Mandatory annual ethics training for Members
Mandatory annual ethics training for Members

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall conduct ongoing ethics training and
			 awareness programs for Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner
			 of the House of Representatives.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Committee on Ethics of the House of Representatives

text.#text: The ethics training program conducted by the

new Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner not later than 60 days after commencing
			 service; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, beginning with the 1st session of the 114th
			 Congress.

text.#text:

This section shall take effect on noon, January 3, 2015.
